divs: Sighting DetailsI went out on the patio for a smoke tonight. I couldn't believe what I saw there was a bright white object over my head in the sky. It looked like a spinning star. So I had to go get out my night-vision goggles. There were two shapes that were just spinning around each other real fast. I couldn't make them out with all the colors from it. It kept going but didn't move anywherer and I just sat there and smoked and watched it and i could not for the life of me figure out what I was seeing. So then, all this color and light sparks starts shootimg off of it and the next thing i know the dam neighbors start shooting their guns at it. It exploded in a rainbow burst of color that shot out all over the sky when I realized, oh my God it was midnight on New Years. The guns kept going off and people were yelling and i didn't know if they were yelling at the craft I saw or just because it was New Years. What a way to bring in the new year. I'll never forget this new years as long as i live, and that's the god's honest truth.
Summary: Saw a UFO people trying to shoot it down.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Mojave
There were no other sightings in Mojave on or around December 31st 2008
